Description: Clay tablet; complete; loan of barley and silver; Old Babylonian.
Curator's comments: The case for this tablet is 1891,0509.2374.A (BM.82275).
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.289)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
